# Smart-Analytics LLC

> Modern data engineering and AI integration consultancy helping startups and SMBs build reliable data infrastructure.

Smart-Analytics LLC is a US-based (Wyoming) data engineering consultancy that delivers practical, no-nonsense data solutions for startups and small-to-midsize businesses. We specialize in building modern data pipelines, cloud migrations, analytics platforms, and AI integration services using best-in-class tools.

## Core Services

- **Data Pipeline Engineering**: ETL/ELT pipeline design and implementation using Keboola, dbt, Airflow, and Python
- **Analytics & Reporting**: End-to-end BI solutions, data modeling, dashboards, and KPI frameworks
- **Cloud Data Infrastructure**: Architecture and migration on GCP, AWS, and Azure (Snowflake, BigQuery)
- **AI Integration & Automation**: Integrating AI tools (LLMs, automation workflows) into existing business processes — not building custom models, but making existing AI work for your stack

## Technology Stack

SQL (Snowflake, BigQuery, MySQL, MSSQL), Python, dbt, Keboola, Google Cloud Platform, Airflow, PostHog, event tracking, REST APIs, N8N automation

## Who We Work With

Tech startups, e-commerce companies, SaaS businesses, and marketing firms with 10–100 employees who need senior-level data engineering without the overhead of a full-time hire.

## What Makes Us Different

- European precision meets American execution speed
- Deep GDPR and data privacy expertise — built into every solution
- Transparent, outcome-focused engagement — no fluff, no surprise invoices
- Multi-cloud and multi-platform fluency across modern data stack
- Comprehensive documentation standard uncommon in US SMB consulting

## Partnerships

Google Cloud Partner, dbt Partner, Keboola Partner

## Contact

- Website: https://smart-analytics.io
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/smart-analytics-llc
